name: White Floral Shirt
description: Perfect for sunny days and warm evenings, this white floral shirt is light and airy, and will keep you looking and feeling cool.

name: Bicolor Shirt
description: Get two looks in one with this versatile shirt! Featuring a bright orange side and a cool blue side with an orange pocket, it's perfect for switching up your style whenever you want.

name: Purple Feline Shirt
description: Get ready to show off your love for felines with this adorable purple shirt featuring a multitude of playful cat illustrations. It's the perfect choice for cat lovers everywhere!

name: Black Sneakers
description: Take on any adventure in style with these sleek and versatile black sport casual sneakers. Perfect for the on-the-go individual who wants both comfort and style.

name: Green Floral Shirt
description: Embrace the beauty of nature with this vibrant green floral shirt. The intricate flower pattern adds a touch of elegance to any outfit.

name: Grey Sneakers
description: Stay on-trend with these fashionable grey sport casual sneakers. Perfect for the gym, running errands, or a night out with friends.

name: Grey Casual Shorts
description: Stay cool and comfortable in these versatile grey casual shorts. Perfect for a day out in the sun or a casual evening with friends.
